Message: To my dear family back home,

Right now, I’m working at
my master’s estate as
an apprentice handmaiden.

He rescued me when I got
caught up in the Witch Hunt,

and agreed to let me
stay with him.

My master is fighting
everyday to save
other girls who are in
the same situation I am.

His goal is to save
every single witch out there,

and it seems he has a long,
cruel journey ahead of him.

So in order to help ease
his troubles even just a little bit,

I want to serve as his handmaiden
and take care of him.

I plan to spare no effort in
attending to him each and
every day.

There are still times
when I get discouraged...

but right now, I feel like
the happiest girl in the world.
